mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.permission FROM sys_menu AS t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS t2 ON t2.menu_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS t3 ON t3.id = t2.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS t4 ON t4.role_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS t5 ON t5.id = t4.user_id WHERE t5.id = #{userId} AND t1.status = 1 AND t1.permission IS NOT NULL
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_menu AS t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS t2 ON t2.menu_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS t3 ON t3.id = t2.role_id WHERE t3.code = #{roleCode} AND t1.status = 1
